lines.text: n , cnt = int and a , b = int arrays of size N each
lines.code: int n , cnt , a [ N ] , b [ N ] ;

lines.text: for i = 0 to n read a [ i ] then set b [ i ] to a [ i ]
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) cin >> a [ i ] , b [ i ] = a [ i ] ;

lines.text: for i = 0 to n increment cnt if a [ i ] does not equal b [ i ]
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) cnt += ( a [ i ] != b [ i ] ) ;

lines.text: print " YES " if cnt is less than 3 else print " NO "
